scripts.compile: node ../compiler/dist/index.js src/demos/VectorCompute.tsx -o src/demos/VectorCompute.gen.tsx && node ../compiler/dist/index.js src/demos/Triangle.tsx -o src/demos/Triangle.gen.tsx && node ../compiler/dist/index.js src/demos/Circles.tsx -o src/demos/Circles.gen.tsx && node ../compiler/dist/index.js src/demos/Lines.tsx -o src/demos/Lines.gen.tsx && node ../compiler/dist/index.js src/demos/ImageDemo.tsx -o src/demos/ImageDemo.gen.tsx && node ../compiler/dist/index.js src/demos/Tests.tsx -o src/demos/Tests.gen.tsx
